701158f-a.title: Bronx: Grand Concourse - McClellan Street
701158f-a.text:
Grand Concourse, at the S.E. corner of McClellan Street, showing the building of the Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Children.

May 16, 1928
701158f-a.folder: Grand Concourse & McClellan Street, Bronx, NY

701161f.title: Bronx: Grand Concourse - McClellan Street
701161f.text:
1155 to 1173 Grand Concourse, west side, north from but not including McLellan Street, to but not including Tudor Place. W.P.A. men are shown doing sidewalk repair work. The negative is reversed.
March 31, 1936.
Works Progress Administration.
Federal Art Project photo.
701161f.folder: Grand Concourse & McClellan Street, Bronx, NY

701159f-a.title: Bronx: Grand Concourse - McClellan Street
701159f-a.text:
Grand Concourse, at the N.E. corner of McClellan Street.
May 16, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
701159f-a.folder: Grand Concourse & McClellan Street, Bronx, NY
